entry.title: Finding Love (Right Here)
entry.summary:
Author: xx_Katya_xx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,578Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 815

Summary: Damian Wayne, the proclaimed Prince of Gotham and son of billionaire philanthropist Bruce Wayne, has for some ungodly reason accepted an arranged marriage proposed by his estranged mother.His father and brothers have very big opinions on this decision. And so does his best friend, Jon Kent.-OR-Damian, for all his negative attitude and showboating, is secretly a romantic and just wants someone to love. No Capes/Heroes AURAPE WARNING - mentions of rape thats happened previously. Not between any tagged relationships but between Talia and Bruce.

entry.title: Single Dad Logan au
entry.summary:
Author: Sugarof5oaks

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,507Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Logan Howlett never thought he would need a partner. OK, maybe need is not the right word. Logan would like a partner; however, when you are a single dad of five kids ranging in age from high school to preschool, your dating pool is very slim. However, that all can change one day when his nosy neighbors, who are best friends, decide to help with his dating life. Not to mention the sexy new neighbor that tolerates Logan's brooding behavior, will Logan find love, or will his temper close off opportunities that prevent him from finding love again?

entry.title: Make It Wayne
entry.summary:
Author: waynewolfling

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,470Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 191

Summary: Gotham’s most infamous billionaire playboy, Bruce Wayne, has spent years building a reputation—just not a good one. Between scandalous headlines, a trail of ex-lovers, and his ridiculous reality TV show, Make It Wayne, no one takes him too seriously. And that’s exactly how he likes it.But when life introduces him to a painfully charming journalist, Bruce starts to wonder if he’s finally losing control of the carefully crafted mess that is his life.

entry.title: Enemy Territory
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,981Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: “I've been looking all night for you. You're a difficult guy to find, you know?”The words were mild but read like a threat regardless. A burst of adrenaline shot through Batman's stomach, sparks down his spine, a cold flush he felt through the undersuit and compression gear. He had three smoke grenades left, one flash, all accessible from his right hip. A light breeze caught Superman’s cape, sent it rippling in a flow of red. Batman's barely shifted, a sturdy weight hanging from his shoulders, leather and a metallic frame beneath.“I was hoping we could talk,” Superman said. Batman gets an offer.
